desc: Run this test suite to discover any problems with the machines basic functions

tests.title: reset test
tests.checkText: Check that A reg, B reg, PC and O reg all have no LEDs lit

tests.title: timing test
tests.checkText: On the timing module, check the blue lights are displayed in the order of FETCH, INC PC, EXE then DISPLAY

tests.title: LDAC test
tests.checkText: Check that A reg and B reg both have no LEDs lit
